sentences.en: Clocks, Wristwatches, Kitchen Accessories, Stainless Steel Gift Items, Table Glassware Gifts Articles.
sentences.cn: 采购产品钟表, 手表, 厨房配件, 不锈钢礼品箱子, 桌子玻璃器具类,赠送礼品.

sentences.en: Dry heat is used principally to sterilze glassware on other heatstable solid materials.
sentences.cn: 干热主要应用于灭菌玻璃器皿或其他耐热的固态材料.

sentences.en: Glassware of attractive appearance can Be appreciated as handicraft articles.
sentences.cn: 造型美观的玻璃器皿,可以当作工艺品来欣赏.

sentences.en: Glassware press machine is the key equipment in shaping glass products.
sentences.cn: 玻璃器皿压机是玻璃制品成形的关键设备.

sentences.en: Glazed pottery or glassware bearing a decorative surface network of fine cracks.
sentences.cn: 裂瓷一种表面饰有细碎裂纹图案的上釉陶器或玻璃制品.

sentences.en: I have some glassware to be ship to Hong Kong. What risks should I cover?
sentences.cn: 我有些玻璃器皿要运到香港，应该保哪些方面的险呢?

sentences.en: It is necessary to use more glassware in this procedure.
sentences.cn: 在这个步骤中需要使用较多的玻离器皿.

sentences.en: Pictures and Frames, Candles and Accessories, Gifts, Bathroom Accessories, Glassware Gifts Articles.
sentences.cn: 采购产品照片和框架, 蜡烛和配件, 礼品, 浴室配件, 玻璃器具类赠送礼品.

sentences.en: Polishing machine is the primary part of glassware's product line.
sentences.cn: 冷爆口机是吹制玻璃器皿加工生产线的主要组成部分.

sentences.en: She made sure that the glassware and earthenware were always spotlessly clean.
sentences.cn: 她总是把玻璃器皿和陶器洗刷得干干净净.

sentences.en: The equipment used consisted primarily of glassware connected by rubber hose.
sentences.cn: 所用设备主要由软皮管连接的玻璃器件构成.

sentences.en: The plates and glassware were rimmed with gold.
sentences.cn: 这些盘子和玻璃器皿都镶着金边。

sentences.en: There was a great deal of breakage in that shipment of glassware.
sentences.cn: 那批玻璃器皿损坏了很多.

sentences.en: They boxed the glassware and books before the movers came.
sentences.cn: 在搬运家具的人到来之前他们将玻璃器皿和书籍装箱。

sentences.en: They can  be bought at any glassware shop .
sentences.cn: 可在任何一家玻璃器皿店中买到。

sentences.en: They hire out glassware for parties.
sentences.cn: 他们出租玻璃器皿供宴会用.

sentences.en: This glassware is expensive because it is hand - blown not machine - moulded.
sentences.cn: 这件玻璃器皿很贵,因为它是手工吹制,不是机器压制.

sentences.en: We have replaced the broken glassware.
sentences.cn: 破碎的玻璃器皿我们已更换。

words.tran_cn: 像玻璃的；光亮透明的；呆滞的

trans.tran_en: glass objects, especially ones used for drinking and eating
